com.percussion.workflow.mail
Class PSMailException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.percussion.error.PSException
              com.percussion.workflow.mail.PSMailException
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSException, Serializable
public class PSMailException
extends PSException

This exception is thrown when Mail Program plugin fails to send a mail message for some reason.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

PSMailException

public PSMailException(String language,
                       int msgCode)
Construct an exception for messages taking locale and msgCode arguments.

Parameters:
language - language string to use while lookingup for the message text in the resource bundle e.g. 'en-us', may be null or empty.
msgCode - the error string to load

PSMailException

public PSMailException(int msgCode)
Construct an exception for messages taking only message code.

Parameters:
msgCode - the error string to load

PSMailException

public PSMailException(String language,
                       int msgCode,
                       Object singleArg)
Construct an exception for messages taking locale and message code arguments and and a single argument.

Parameters:
language - language string to use while lookingup for the message text in the resource bundle e.g. 'en-us', may be null or empty.
msgCode - the error string to load
singleArg - the argument to use as the sole argument in the error message. Can be null.

PSMailException

public PSMailException(String language,
                       int msgCode,
                       Object[] arrayArgs)
Construct an exception for messages taking language, message code and an array of arguments. Be sure to store the arguments in the correct order in the array, where {0} in the string is array element 0, etc.

Parameters:
language - language string to use while lookingup for the message text in the resource bundle e.g. 'en-us', may be null or empty.
msgCode - the error string to load
arrayArgs - the array of arguments to use as the arguments in the error message. Can be null.

PSMailException

public PSMailException(Exception e)
Constructor that takes another exception as an argument. The plugin can throw an exception when the internal mail program throws its own exception.

Parameters:
e - axception thrown by the mail program API as Exception. Can be null.
